Content.Text:
<FACE_MORRIS><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hold your horses, Melanie. <MYNAME> is pretty
busy these days. Why don't you go play by
yourself?

<FACE_MELTY><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Pleeeease? Just for a little bit?

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thanks, <MYNAME>. I know she really
appreciates it.

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
See? What did I tell you? Now go on and play,
and don't be too loud.

<FACE_MELTY><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Okay... We don't have to play, but I wanna tell
you something. It won't take long, I promise.
Pretty pleeease?

<FACE_MELTY><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thanks. Let's go outside for a minute.

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Be sure to come back in when you're done,
okay? Sorry, <MYNAME>. Could you spare a few
minutes for her?

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I will! C'mon, let's go outside.

<FACE_MELTY><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
Um, <MYNAME>? I, uh...have something I want
to ask you. It's about my dad.

<FACE_MELTY><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
Do you know of anybody he could marry?

<FACE_MELTY><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
I mean, sometimes I see Daddy looking really
lonely, and Lillie is always busy with her job and
all the chores. And, um...
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I really want to have a mommy...

<FACE_MELTY><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
W-well, if you can't think of anybody, that's
okay. I just wanted to see if you knew someone.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>But don't tell Daddy I asked, okay? It'll be our
secret!

<FACE_MELTY><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, just one more thing.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ANGRY>Is there anyone in town that YOU have a crush
on?

<FACE_MELTY><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Really?! Eeeeee! Tell me! Tell me who it is!

<FACE_MELTY><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Aww...you don't?
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Well, you can always tell me if there's someone
you kinda-sorta-maybe like, right?

<FACE_MELTY><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Okay, I'll go and see what they think about you!

<FACE_MELTY><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Don't worry, I'll be super sneaky, so they won't
suspect your true feelings. Just leave it to me!

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I'll come tell you what I find out later. It's gonna
be great, I just know it! <RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MELTY><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Okay. I'll go and see what she thinks about you!
